data.representation.images.sift

Class LFeatVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.DataInstance
      • data.representation.images.sift.LFeatVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteredSIFTVector

    public class LFeatVector
extends DataInstance
    A data holder class for the basic SIFT feature vector, where the first 4 values are Y, X , scale, orientation and the remaining ones belong to the descriptor.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
